title: Cozy Commonwealth Ave Studio! Close to the Green Line
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 39295498', 'Rent: $1,950 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Negotiable, No Dog', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', '- 9/1/22 move in', '- Heat and hot water included.', '- Laundry on site.', '- 1 months broker fee.', 'Spacious studio right on Commonwealth Avenue.', 'Hardwood flooring through out the apartment.', 'Call now!', 'Bus: 66 Harvard Ave @ Commonwealth Ave (0.08 mi)', 'Tram: B Harvard Avenue (0.06 mi)', 'Bus: 57 Brighton Ave @ Linden St (0.12 mi)', 'Bus: 64 Cambridge St @ Harvard Ave (0.35 mi)', 'Val Temin', '6177845998', 'If you would like to take a look at additional apartment options please see below:', 'https://ygl.is/valvel-temin', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
